name: Obama Among Us
description:
(shoutout to Five Nights at Obama's For inspiring this.)

ObungUs is a parody of The Famous Game: Among Us, created by  InnerSloth LLC. This project is being made with me and my friends as a fun side project, ya know. Sadly, this won't be made as a game. But, it might be in the future. This page is to help people stay informed on the updates of the project.

Developers:

Anh Thach/Obama Minion. EXE - Creator of Project | Creating All Media For the Project

Anh Tran Duy Thach/ObungUS/Obama Minion.EXE - Main Creator of the Script|Admin

Meba Fasil  - Co Creator of the Script
